title: Eventful Britain [b&w]
creator_credit: Associated British-Pathe and British Travel and Holidays Association
brief_description: Sets out to show that there is always something on in Britain. Ranges over a calendar of events, crowded with ceremonies and sporting fixtures which are open to all and cost little or nothing to attend. Includes such events as the Brighton Veteran Car Run, the Farnborough Air Show, the Henley Royal Regatta, the FA Cup Final at Wembley and much more.
